headline: Sempra (NYSE:SRE) Reports Increased Q1 Earnings And Updates 2025 EPS Guidance
summary: Sempra (NYSE:SRE) recently reported a solid financial performance for the first quarter of 2025, with increased sales and net income compared to the previous year. This financial strength, coupled with updated full-year earnings guidance, likely played a role in the company's share price rising 19% over the past month. Meanwhile, broader market trends had mixed influences, with indexes showing marginal fluctuations amid investor focus on trade talks and interest rates decisions. In this...

headline: Sempra to sell Mexican natural gas business to fund transmission expansion in Texas
summary: The sale of gas assets and a minority interest in Sempra Infrastructure would reduce the company's need to issue new common stock to fund its $56 billion capital plan, CEO Jeff Martin said.

headline: Sempra (SRE) Q1 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Strong EPS Growth and Strategic Investments
summary: Sempra (SRE) reports increased earnings and reaffirms guidance, while planning significant infrastructure investments in the U.S.
